implementation().details: Tells the address of the current implementation

params.addrRegistry: Address of ProxyRegistry contract which will manage this proxy
params.addrUser: Address of user on whose behalf this proxy will act

proxy(address,uint8,bytes).details: Can be called by the user, or by a contract authorized by the registry as long as the user has not revoked access

params.dest: Address to which the call will be sent
params.howToCall: Which kind of call to make

proxy(address,uint8,bytes).return: Result of the call (success or failure)

proxyAssert(address,uint8,bytes).details: Same functionality as `proxy`, just asserts the return value

params.dest: Address to which the call will be sent
params.howToCall: What kind of call to make

receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,.details: Receive tokens and generate a log event

params.from: Address from which to transfer tokens

setRevoke(bool).details: Can be called by the user only

params.revoke: Whether or not to revoke access

upgradeabilityOwner().details: Tells the address of the owner

proxy(address,uint8,bytes).notice: Execute a message call from the proxy contract

proxyAssert(address,uint8,bytes).notice: Execute a message call and assert success

setRevoke(bool).notice: Set the revoked flag (allows a user to revoke ProxyRegistry access)
